statements: SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, director FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director='Steven Spielberg';
SELECT title FROM movies ORDER BY movie_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director='Christopher Nolan';
SELECT title FROM movies WHERE director='Quentin Tarantino' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE movie_id < 10 AND director='Steven Spielberg' ORDER BY movie_id DESC;
SELECT director, title FROM movies WHERE director='Martin Scorsese' AND title LIKE '%Godfather%';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_id in (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_title, director_id FROM movies;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title FROM movies WHERE director_id = 1;
SELECT movie_title FROM movies WHERE movie_id = 5;
SELECT director_name FROM directors;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_title, director_id FROM movies ORDER BY movie_id DESC;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies, directors WHERE movies.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT movie_title FROM movies WHERE director_id = 2;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM directors, movies WHERE directors.director_id = movies.director_id GROUP BY director_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY movie_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_title, director_id FROM movies WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT director_name, movie_title FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director_id = 2;
SELECT movie_title FROM movies WHERE director_id = 1;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN movie_director ON movies.movie_id = movie_director.movie_id JOIN directors ON movie_director.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT * FROM directors WHERE director_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY director_id DESC;

SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN movie_director ON movies.movie_id = movie_director.movie_id JOIN directors ON movie_director.director_id = directors.director_id WHERE movies.movie_title LIKE '%Love%' ORDER BY movies.movie_id;

SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM directors JOIN movie_director ON directors.director_id = movie_director.director_id GROUP BY director_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY movie_count DESC;

SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN movie_director ON movies.movie_id = movie_director.movie_id JOIN directors ON movie_director.director_id = directors.director_id WHERE directors.director_name = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, director_id FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT director_id, name FROM directors;
SELECT title, name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT title, director_id FROM movies WHERE director_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, name AS director_name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.director_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT director_id, name FROM directors WHERE name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_movies, director_id FROM movies GROUP BY director_id HAVING total_movies >= 2 ORDER BY total_movies DESC;
SELECT * FROM Movies;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title FROM Movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT director_name, nationality FROM Directors;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM Movies JOIN MovieDirector ON Movies.movie_id = MovieDirector.movie_id JOIN Directors ON MovieDirector.director_id = Directors.director_id;
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE release_year = 1995;
SELECT * FROM Movies;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM Movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM Movies JOIN MovieDirector ON Movies.movie_id = MovieDirector.movie_id JOIN Directors ON MovieDirector.director_id = Directors.director_id;

SELECT movie_title, release_year, nationality FROM Movies JOIN MovieDirector ON Movies.movie_id = MovieDirector.movie_id JOIN Directors ON MovieDirector.director_id = Directors.director_id WHERE release_year > 2000;

SELECT movie_title, director_name, nationality FROM Movies JOIN MovieDirector ON Movies.movie_id = MovieDirector.movie_id JOIN Directors ON MovieDirector.director_id = Directors.director_id ORDER BY director_name ASC;
